org.hypknowsys.wumprep
Class WUMprepWrapper.ScriptOutputReader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.hypknowsys.wumprep.WUMprepWrapper.ScriptOutputReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
WUMprepWrapper
private class WUMprepWrapper.ScriptOutputReader
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.io.Serializable

Implements a thread for reading a script's output from m_outputReader and sending it to m_outputWriter.
